titleStmt.title: Nevves from the siege before Yorke. Being a letter from an eminent person out of the Leaguer there; dated the 16. of June. 1644. Together with the articles for the rendring of it up, which were interchangably propounded and sent on both sides. Authorized according to order.
Newes from the siege before Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Eminent person out of the Leaguer.
Fairfax, Ferdinando Fairfax, Baron, 1584-1648.
Leven, Alexander Leslie, Earl of, 1580?-1661.
Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. O. for H. S.,

notesStmt.note: "Subscribed by The Earle of Leven. The Lord Fairfax. The Earle of Manchester." [p. 6] as part of "Propositions sent from the three generalls for the Parliament to the treatie, June 14, 1644.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
